mapper.select: /* file : CategoryMapper.xml, id : getCategory1List */ SELECT *, (select group_concat(NAME) from ST_CATEGORY1) as GROUP_NAME FROM ST_CATEGORY1 WHERE DEL_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY CATEGORY1_SEQ

/* file : CategoryMapper.xml, id : getCategory2List */ SELECT *, replace(replace(NAME,' ',''),'/','_') as C2_NAME, (select group_concat(NAME) from ST_CATEGORY2) as GROUP_NAME FROM ST_CATEGORY2 WHERE DEL_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY CATEGORY2_SEQ

/* file : CategoryMapper.xml, id : getCategory3List */ SELECT C3.*, replace(replace(C2.NAME,' ',''),'/','_') as C2_NAME, (select group_concat(NAME) from ST_CATEGORY3) as GROUP_NAME FROM ST_CATEGORY3 AS C3 LEFT JOIN ST_CATEGORY2 AS C2 ON C2.CATEGORY2_SEQ = C3.CATEGORY2_SEQ WHERE C3.DEL_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY CATEGORY3_SEQ
/* file : CategoryMapper.xml, id : getMappingCategory2 */ select group_concat(DISTINCT(CATEGORY2_SEQ)) as G_CATE2 from ST_USER_ANSWER2 where REG_USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} and DEL_FLAG = 0
